name: The myth of Radfall
description:
You were born and raised on the underground, you've heard a lot of stories about the outside and how isn't the place that once was habitable, all the people are comfortable with his current life and they really think that this underground is their world, and all who get out don't come back, but anyways you want to see it with your own eyes. They say that out there are dangerous beings and you can't even breath more than 5 minutes, but will that be true? 

Welcome to my first post-apocalyptic prototype project, an allegory to the myth of the cave of Plato.

P.S: Ignore the the resolution settings, won't work on all computers, but won't be a problem, the standard is the original.
